alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 01 at 1:38PM PDT until November 02 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may result in reduced visibilities. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult with high profile vehicles especially along east to west routes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; White Pine County
